front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Measurement of Sound Pressure Levels of Outdoor Power Circuit Breakers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard provides methods for the measurement of sound pressure level produced by outdoor power circuit-breakers in a free-field environment. These methods may also be used indoors or in restricted field, provided that precautions are observed in the measurement and interpretation of the results.
